name: bankIO-cypress-api-testing
description: Cypress E2E runner can also test Rest and other APIs

scripts.cy:run-mocha: cypress run -e TAGS='not @avoid' --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/screenshots --reporter-options configFile=reporterOpts.json
scripts.cy:delete-results: mkdir -p cypress/results && rm -f -R cypress/results/* && mkdir -p cypress/screenshots && rm -f -R cypress/screenshots/*
scripts.cy:mochawesome-merge: grep -l '"tests": 0,' cypress/results/* | xargs -r rm && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > cypress/mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:run-mocha-all: npm run cy:delete-results && npm run cy:run-mocha && npm run cy:mochawesome-merge && npm run cy:mochawesome-report-generator

author: bankIO
